question: Whenever a process needs I/O to or from a disk it issues a ______________
options: ['a) system call to the CPU', 'b) system call to the operating system', 'c) a special procedure', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option1: a) system call to the CPU
option2: b) system call to the operating system

question: If a process needs I/O to or from a disk, and if the drive or controller is busy then ____________
options: ['a) the request will be placed in the queue of pending requests for that drive', 'b) the request will not be processed and will be ignored completely', 'c) the request will be not be placed', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) the request will be placed in the queue of pending requests for that drive
option2: b) the request will not be processed and will be ignored completely
option3: c) the request will be not be placed

question: Consider a disk queue with requests for I/O to blocks on cylinders
options: ['98 183 37 122 14 124 65 67', 'Considering FCFS (first cum first served) scheduling, the total number of head movements is, if the disk head is initially at 53 is?', 'a) 600', 'b) 620']
option2: Considering FCFS (first cum first served) scheduling, the total number of head movements is, if the disk head is initially at 53 is?

question: Consider a disk queue with requests for I/O to blocks on cylinders
options: ['98 183 37 122 14 124 65 67', 'Considering SSTF (shortest seek time first) scheduling, the total number of head movements is, if the disk head is initially at 53 is?', 'a) 224', 'b) 236']
option2: Considering SSTF (shortest seek time first) scheduling, the total number of head movements is, if the disk head is initially at 53 is?

question: Random access in magnetic tapes is _________ compared to magnetic disks
options: ['a) fast', 'b) very fast', 'c) slow', 'd) very slow']

question: Magnetic tape drives can write data at a speed ________ disk drives
options: ['a) much lesser than', 'b) comparable to', 'c) much faster than', 'd) none of the mentioned']

question: On media that use constant linear velocity (CLV), the _____________ is uniform
options: ['a) density of bits on the disk', 'b) density of bits per sector', 'c) the density of bits per track', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) density of bits on the disk
option2: b) density of bits per sector
option3: c) the density of bits per track
explanation: The farther a track is from the center of the disk.

question: SSTF algorithm, like SJF __________ of some requests
options: ['a) may cause starvation', 'b) will cause starvation', 'c) does not cause starvation', 'd) causes aging']

question: In the ______ algorithm, the disk arm starts at one end of the disk and moves toward the other end, servicing requests till the other end of the disk
In the _______ algorithm, the disk head moves from one end to the other, servicing requests along the way
In the ______ algorithm, the disk arm goes as far as the final request in each direction, then reverses direction immediately without going to the end of the disk
